upcomingEvents.title: Wildlife Photography Workshop 2025
upcomingEvents.description: Join our expert-led workshop to master wildlife photography techniques in the heart of Sri Lanka's national parks. Learn advanced camera settings, animal behavior prediction, and ethical photography practices.

upcomingEvents.title: Conservation Photography Exhibition
upcomingEvents.description: Experience the power of photography in conservation through our curated exhibition featuring award-winning wildlife images and conservation success stories from across Sri Lanka.

upcomingEvents.title: Bird Photography Masterclass
upcomingEvents.description: Specialized workshop focusing on avian photography techniques, bird identification, and capturing the perfect bird in flight shots in Sri Lanka's diverse ecosystems.

pastEvents.title: Wildlife Photography Competition 2024
pastEvents.description: Our annual photography competition brought together over 200 photographers from around the world, showcasing the incredible biodiversity of Sri Lanka through stunning imagery.

pastEvents.title: Conservation Awareness Campaign
pastEvents.description: A comprehensive campaign to raise awareness about endangered species in Sri Lanka, featuring photography exhibitions, school visits, and community engagement programs.

pastEvents.title: Photography Equipment Workshop
pastEvents.description: Hands-on workshop covering camera equipment, lens selection, and maintenance for wildlife photography, helping photographers optimize their gear for field work.

pastEvents.title: Marine Life Photography Expedition
pastEvents.description: Exclusive expedition to capture marine life around Sri Lanka's coastal waters, featuring whales, dolphins, and diverse marine ecosystems through underwater photography.

pastEvents.title: Student Photography Mentorship
pastEvents.description: Educational program designed for young photographers, providing mentorship, equipment access, and field experience in wildlife photography and conservation.

pastEvents.title: Documentary Photography Project
pastEvents.description: Comprehensive documentation of Sri Lanka's wildlife conservation efforts, creating visual stories that highlight the challenges and successes in protecting biodiversity.

pastEvents.title: Camera Trap Installation Project
pastEvents.description: Scientific project installing camera traps across protected areas to monitor wildlife populations and gather data for conservation research and management.

pastEvents.title: Photography Ethics Workshop
pastEvents.description: Educational workshop focusing on ethical wildlife photography practices, ensuring minimal disturbance to animals while capturing compelling images.

pastEvents.title: Wildlife Rehabilitation Photography
pastEvents.description: Documentation project capturing the rehabilitation process of injured wildlife, raising awareness about wildlife rescue and rehabilitation efforts in Sri Lanka.

pastEvents.title: Community Photography Training
pastEvents.description: Empowering local communities through photography training, enabling them to document their natural resources and contribute to conservation efforts.

pastEvents.title: Aerial Photography Project
pastEvents.description: Innovative project using drone photography to capture unique perspectives of Sri Lanka's landscapes and wildlife from above.

pastEvents.title: Night Photography Workshop
pastEvents.description: Specialized workshop teaching night photography techniques for capturing nocturnal wildlife and creating stunning low-light wildlife images.

pastEvents.title: Photography Equipment Donation
pastEvents.description: Charity project donating photography equipment to schools and conservation organizations to support their documentation and educational efforts.
